attributes.action: make the option of teleworking a legal right for all people working with computers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apart from the increased productivity for the employer and the escape from office politics and petty regulations for the employee, this will also provide the following other benefits at the very least:
reduced office space requirement

reduced parking requirement at the employer

saving in travel costs for the employee

less congestion on the roads


I only mention "computers" here, but there are also many other jobs which can be done much more efficiently from a home office.
